text: Never ever an issue with my order. Always prompt delivery and the food is always hot. Papa johns and Pizza Hut in this area don’t stand a chance.

name: Richard Hayes
text:
I order delivery from here almost weekly or more for a couple of years. Always a normal or quick delivery.
And I honestly can’t think of any orders being wrong, or cooked incorrectly.
And the delivery drivers have always been punctual.
